name: places/ChIJR8cV-qxZwokRXAiWwglZ7Kw
formattedAddress: 96 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 96 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009-6265, USA

originalText.text: We record at Melrose Podcasts weekly and it is always a great experience. They have really helped us level up the sound and video quality of our podcast! I've tried a few other studios in the city but love Melrose because we love working with Chris and they don't have cheesy podcast wall backgrounds :)

text.text: We record at Melrose Podcasts weekly and it is always a great experience. They have really helped us level up the sound and video quality of our podcast! I've tried a few other studios in the city but love Melrose because we love working with Chris and they don't have cheesy podcast wall backgrounds :)

originalText.text: Melrose Podcasts is the best place to film in NYC. The studio’s atmosphere is very inviting, cozy and has a unique charm to it. The producers are very kind, passionate, intelligible, and adept at what they do. I had questions regarding how I could grow my podcast and the producers were quick to respond with helpful feedback and unique insights into the podcasting/social media landscape that helped me grow my platform and repurpose my content; I felt like I could just jump right into my discussion without any concern for the production element of things, and I cannot be more grateful for that. The studio is located in one of the best parts of the city and is a very convenient location for my guests to come into. The prices are very affordable compared to other studios in the area and the quality of the final product is bar none. I highly recommend this studio to anyone looking to film in the area, you will not regret it!

originalText.text: Melrose Podcasts is the best studio I've ever recorded in. Studio space in New York isn't easy to come by and the team at Melrose does it well. The producers are knowledgable and helpful. The equipment is top notch. I don't see myself recording anywhere else.

text.text: Melrose Podcasts is the best studio I've ever recorded in. Studio space in New York isn't easy to come by and the team at Melrose does it well. The producers are knowledgable and helpful. The equipment is top notch. I don't see myself recording anywhere else.

originalText.text:
In the beating heart of New York City’s East Village, Melrose Podcasts stands as a bastion of audio artistry, a place where the spoken word is not merely recorded, but elevated to an art form. My journey to their studio was a foray into a world where meticulous craftsmanship meets the boundless realm of storytelling. There, amidst a fusion of modern technology and creative passion, I found more than a podcasting service; I discovered a sanctuary for the narrative craft.

Central to this experience was Chris Mueller, a maestro of the medium whose expertise transformed my project into an aural masterpiece. Working with Chris was akin to a symphonic collaboration, where each note of my story found its perfect pitch and rhythm under his guidance. The team at Melrose Podcasts, led by Chris’s skilled hand, not only honed the conversation recorded but imbued it with a vibrancy that resonated deeply with its listeners. In this haven of storytelling, under the deft touch of Chris and his team, my podcast was not just produced but was given life, leaving an indelible mark on the hearts and minds of its audience.

originalText.text: Love the studio and the producer! It definitely has the best aesthetic out of the studios I’ve recorded in in NYC and the producer is very helpful and accommodating. There’s also a great coffee shop across the street.
